Destaques do dia!

Aproveite as super opções que separamos para você:

Ver produto

Ver produto

Regata Masculina

Ver produto
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit { public products: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getProducts(); } public getProducts(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/products').subscribe( response => this.products = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
